DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to see if solifenacin has any effect on bladder wall thickness and urine inflammatory marker measurements after 12 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Study of 2 Doses of Solifenacin Succinate in Female Subjects With Overactive Bladder.
DOC.detailed_description: Participants satisfying all selection criteria at the end of the 2-week, single blind, placebo run-in period were randomized to receive 12-week double-blind treatment with solifenacin 5 mg or 10 mg once daily, or placebo.
